actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, State Department, Commerce Department.
Committee on Finance. Ordered favorably reported H.R. 3398 in lieu of this bill.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to prevent the exportation or importation of certain vehicles.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to provide civil penalties for persons who import, export, or attempt to import or export: (1) any stolen self-propelled vehicle, vessel, aircraft, or part thereof; or (2) a self-propelled vehicle or vehicle part knowing that its identification number has been altered. Requires the forfeiture of any such vehicle or vehicle part. Requires that persons who attempt to export a used self-propelled vehicle must present to the appropriate customs officer the vehicle and a document describing such vehicle.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to prevent the exportation or importation of certain vehicles.
